# Problem 1

## Creating a dataframe
The chunk below creates a dataframe containing a sample of size 10 from a 
random uniform[0,5] distributed variable, a logical vector indicating whether elements of the sample are greater than 2, a (length-10) character vector, and a (length-10) factor vector.

```{r create_data_frame}
library(tidyverse)

prob1_df = tibble(
  unif_samp = runif(10, min = 0, max = 5),
  vec_logical = c(TRUE, FALSE, TRUE, FALSE, FALSE, TRUE, TRUE, TRUE, TRUE,
                  FALSE),
  vec_char = c("This", "is", "my", "first", "homework", "using", "R", "for",
               "data", "science"),
  vec_factor = factor(c("greater", "less", "greater", "less", "less",
                        "greater", "greater", "greater", "greater", "less"))
)
```
